import React from 'react' const Register = () => { // Init State for Registration Data const[formData, setFormData] = React.useState({ parentName: "", parentEmail: "", parentPassword: "", childName: "", childUsername: "", childPassword: "", }) // Update registerData whenever form data changes function handleChange(event) { const {name, value} = event.target; setFormData((prevFormData) => ({ ...prevFormData, [name]: value, })) } function handleSubmit(event) { event.preventDefault(); alert("You have Registered!") console.log(formData) // FETCH POST } return (

Parent Sign Up

Child Details

) } export default Register
